definition: not to have the guts (to do sth)/cowardly

sentences.english: Why don't you have the balls to tell me yourself?
sentences.chinese: 你怎麼就沒種自己親自跟我說？

sentences.english: What are you doing?Don't dilly dally, hurry up!
sentences.chinese: 是啊，你怎麼知道我上回在屋外沒種成？

sentences.english: How long will I endure the insincere prayers of your spineless subjects?
sentences.chinese: 我忍受你那些沒種的臣民虛假的禱告，要到幾時呢？

sentences.english: China knows that we donot have the guts to deal with Pak, let alone China.
sentences.chinese: 中國知道我們沒種去對付巴基斯坦，更不用說中國了。

sentences.english: There is one popular plant that I have not tried it, i. e, hibiscus .
sentences.chinese: 有一種很受歡迎的植物我沒種過，就是木槿。

sentences.english: Yeah, how did you know I haven't sowed well outside?
sentences.chinese: 是啊，你怎麼知道我上回在屋外沒種成？
